<page title>: Cleverboxes - E2482HS-GB1 | Iiyama ProLite E2482HS (23.6 inch) LED Backlit LCD Monitor 1000:1 300cd/m2 (1920x1080) 2ms VGA/DVI/HDMI (Black)
description: HDMI stands for High-Definition Multimedia Interface. Much smaller and more convenient than DVI, HDMI also has the significant advantage over DVI that it supports audio as well as video signals. When very fast graphics are displayed your monitor can sometimes get blurry. Turning on the OverDrive feature will eliminate that. VESA mount compliance means you can easily mount your monitor to a wall.
in the box: Iiyama ProLite E2482HS Monitor (Black), Power cable, VGA (D-Sub) cable, DVI-D cable, Audio cable, Stand, Stand-base, Cable holder, Quick start guide, Safety guide
screen type: TFT LCD TN Panel 16.7 million Colour
user controls: Luminance (contrast, brightness, ECO, i-style Colour, ACR), image setup (clock, phase, H. position, V. position, aspect), colour (gamma, colour temperature, sRGB), OSD setup (H. position, V. position, OSD time out, language), others (reset, signal select, HDMI audio, OD, information), volume, auto adjust and 5 front controls (Power, Menu, +/ Volume, -/ ECO, Auto)
warranty: Two years on-site (plus 1 free year extra - registration required).
